alert.note: Alert for Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 4:54PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Harrison and Jackson Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 453 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles southwest of Lucedale to 8 miles northwest of Latimer to near Saucier. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Biloxi, Moss Point, Escatawpa, St. Martin, D`iberville, Wade, Latimer, Big Point, Helena, Hurley, Vancleave, Hickory Hills, Gulf Hills and Saucier. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 49 and 57, and between mile markers 69 and 75. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson
